Inline form with floating labels
 

    


    


      

        
        
      


      

        
        
      


      

        
        
      


      

        
        
      

    


    

      
This uses Jquery label better for floating labels.
        

        just add the class label_better and data-position="top" to the input then initiate with jQuery. More info on the plugin page.
